app_descript:
App Name: Toca Hair Salon 4
Package Name: com.tocaboca.tocahairsalon4

Brief:

Welcome to Toca Hair Salon 4, the playful and interactive hair styling game where creativity flourishes! With an assortment of tools at your disposal, unleash your inner stylist to cut, color, design, and style hair along with impressive makeup applications, ensuring every character in your salon leaves with a unique and delightful look. It's not just hair; it's about the total transformation!

Core Features:

  • üßº Hair and Beard Station: Cut, restyle, dye, and texturize hair to your heart's content. Each tool offers a new way to transform the characters' look! üõ†Ô∏è
  • üé® Face Station: Purchase to unlock a world of makeup options. Apply mascara, eyeliner, eyeshadow, blush, and face paint for vivid face art. üñåÔ∏è
  • üëó Style Station: Browse through hundreds of fashion items to complement the new hairstyles and makeup, including accessories like hats and glasses. üï∂Ô∏è
  • üì∏ Photo Booth: Capture the final look in different poses against a variety of backgrounds, and store these memories in a photo book. üñºÔ∏è
  • üöø Shampoo Station: Wash away the day's styling to start fresh or watch the makeup fade under a thorough shampooing. üí¶
